test.name: Does Entity Statements contain the sub parameter
test.description: In order to check if the entity subues correct Entity statements, a request for an entity statement is made (HTTP GET request in the entity's fetch endpoint) and the response is analyzed. Therefore, the Entity Statement Payload contained in the response are base64url decoded, once obtained the decrypted Payload, the presence if the sub parameter is checked. It must be an HTTPS URL.
